ABUSE_ADMIN_FUNNY_FEELING: %s (Id:%d) might be using %s, please keep an eye out; incident: {FFECB3}%s

ABUSE_ADMIN_DETECTED: %s (Id:%d) has been found to be using %s, incident: {FFECB3}%s
ACCOUNT_ADMIN_ALIAS_CREATED: %s (Id:%d) has added %s as an alias for their account.
ACCOUNT_ADMIN_ALIAS_DELETED: %s (Id:%d) has deleted %s as an alias for their account.
ACCOUNT_ADMIN_CREATED: %s (Id:%d) has registered an account in their name.
ACCOUNT_ADMIN_VIP_CHANGED: %s (Id:%d) has changed their VIP status to %s.
ACCOUNT_NOT_AVAILABLE: @error All account management options have been disabled.
ACCOUNT_NOT_REGISTERED: @error %s is not a registered account. Create yours on https://sa-mp.nl/!
ACHIEVEMENT_BOMB_SHOP: {00E676}* You can now use the Vehicle Bomb Shop in Las Venturas!
ACHIEVEMENT_VEHICLE_COLOR: {00E676}* You can now change your vehicle's colour by clicking on numpad 4!
ACHIEVEMENT_VEHICLE_GRAVITY: {00E676}* You can now change the gravity in your vehicle by clicking on numpad 8!
ACHIEVEMENT_VEHICLE_JUMP: {00E676}* You can now jump in your vehicle outside of Las Venturas by using the horn!
ACHIEVEMENT_VEHICLE_NITRO: {00E676}* You can now add nitrogen to your vehicle by clicking on the fire key!
ACHIEVEMENT_VEHICLE_SPAWN: {00E676}* You can now use the {388E3C}%s{00E676} and {388E3C}%s{00E676} commands to spawn vehicles!
ANIMATIONS_EXECUTE_BY_ADMIN: {E0E0E0}* %s (Id:%d) has started the /%s animation for you.
ANIMATIONS_NOT_IDLE: @error Unable to start an animation, because %s.
ANIMATIONS_NOT_ON_FOOT: @error Unable to start an animation, because you're not currently on foot.
ANNOUNCE_MINIGAME: {CCD782}Sign up for the {838F31}%s{CCD782}! Type {838F31}%s{CCD782} to join.
ANNOUNCEMENT_TOGGLED: @success The {FFA500}%s{A9C4E4} announcement has been %s for you.
BANK_NEED_ACCOUNT: @error You need to register on https://sa-mp.nl/ to get a bank account!
BANK_NOT_ENOUGH_CASH: @error You aren't carrying enough cash to deposit %$.
BANK_NOT_ENOUGH_FUNDS: @error There aren't enough funds in your bank account to withdraw %$.
BANK_NO_AVAILABLE_CASH: @error You cannot carry more than %$ in cash.
BANK_NO_AVAILABLE_BALANCE: @error The bank is not willing to store more than %$ for you.

BANK_STORED: {2196F3}* You have deposited {BBDEFB}%${2196F3}. Your new account balance is {BBDEFB}%${2196F3}.
BANK_WITHDRAWN: {2196F3}* You have withdrawn {BBDEFB}%${2196F3}. Your new account balance is {BBDEFB}%${2196F3}.
COLLECTABLE_HINT: {C6FF00}* The %s is about %s meters to the %s, in %s.
COLLECTABLE_INSTRUCTIONS_RED_BARRELS:
A hundred {FF5252}Red Barrels{A9C4E4} have been left all over Las Venturas,
causing havoc and endangering all players on the server. We
need your help in finding and exploding them!
COLLECTABLE_INSTRUCTIONS_SPRAY_TAGS:
A hundred {B2FF59}Spray Tags{A9C4E4} have been left all over Las Venturas,
by gangs we haven't heard of for years. Would you kindly
help us out by tagging them as your own?
COLLECTABLE_INSTRUCTIONS_TREASURES:
Fifty {B2FF59}old books{A9C4E4} have been left all over Red County, Flint County
and Whetstone, each containing a hint that will help you find
a valuable {B2FF59}Treasure{A9C4E4}. Can you find them all?
COLLECTABLE_TREASURE_FOUND: {C6FF00}* You have discovered a treasure worth %$!
COLLECTABLE_TREASURE_HOW: {C6FF00}* You can use the "/treasures" command to see all treasure hints.
COMMAND_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_RIGHTS: @error Sorry, this command is only available to %s.
COMMAND_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_RIGHTS_BETA: @error Sorry, you must have a registered account in order to use this command.
COMMAND_ERROR_UNKNOWN_PLAYER: @error Sorry, no player could be found for "%s".

COMMUNICATION_ADMIN_SENT: @success Your message has been sent to the administrators.

COMMUNICATION_CALL_DISCONNECTED_UNLOAD: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * Your conversation with %s has ended because the feature is being reloaded.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_ANSWER_UNKNOWN: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * There are no calls to answer right now.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_BUSY_SELF: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * Your phone is already calling %s. Use {DC143C}/hangup{FFFFFF} first.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_BUSY_RECIPIENT: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * %s is already using their phone, they need to hang up first.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_EXPIRED: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * %s did not pick up the phone.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_EXPIRED_RECIPIENT: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * You did not acknowledge the call from %s.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_HANGUP_UNKNOWN: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * You aren't calling anyone at the moment.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_REJECT_UNKNOWN: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * There are no calls to reject right now.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_REJECTED: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * You have rejected the phone call from %s.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_REQUEST: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * %s is calling you. Respond by using either {DC143C}/answer{FFFFFF} or {DC143C}/reject{FFFFFF}.
COMMUNICATION_DIAL_SELF: {DC143C}[Phone]{FFFFFF} * You cannot call yourself over the phone, silly billy.
COMMUNICATION_FILTER_BLOCKED: @error Your message has been blocked because it includes a forbidden word.
COMMUNICATION_IRCPM_NO_VIP: @error Sorry, this command is only available to VIPs. Please see {DC143C}/donate{FFFFFF} for more information.
COMMUNICATION_LOGIN_BLOCKED: @error Your message has been blocked because you need to login first. Use '@hi' to reach administrators.
COMMUNICATION_MUTE_BLOCKED: @error Your message has been blocked because you're muted for another %s.
COMMUNICATION_MUTE_IRC_DISABLED: @success Messages from unregistered people on IRC will be allowed again.
COMMUNICATION_MUTE_IRC_ENABLED: @success Messages from unregistered people on IRC will now be ignored.
COMMUNICATION_PM_IGNORED: @error You cannot send messages to people you are ignoring.
COMMUNICATION_PM_SELF: @error You cannot send messages to yourself.
COMMUNICATION_PM_TARGET_MUTED: @error Your message has been blocked because %s (Id: %d) is muted for another %s.
COMMUNICATION_PSAY_SENT: @success The message has been sent, but mind that it's still subject to filters.
COMMUNICATION_REPLY_NONE: @error You haven't received messages you can respond to yet.
COMMUNICATION_SERVER_MUTE_BLOCKED: @error Your message has been blocked because all communication has been muted.
COMMUNICATION_SERVER_MUTED: {DC143C}*** %s has muted all communication on the server.
COMMUNICATION_SERVER_UNMUTED: {DC143C}*** %s has unmuted all communication on the server.
COMMUNICATION_SPAM_BLOCKED: @error Your message has been blocked by our spam filter.
COMMUNICATION_SPM_SELF: @error You cannot send messages to yourself.
COMMUNICATION_VIP_NO_ACCESS: @error Only VIPs are allowed to use this chat. Check out {2196F3}/donate{FFFFFF} for more information!

HOUSE_INFO_2: available to the richer players on the server.

HOUSE_NO_ACCESS_FRIENDS: {10F441}Sorry, you don't have access to %s's house. Ask them to add you as a friend?
HOUSE_NO_ACCESS_PERSONAL: {10F441}Sorry, you don't have access to %s's house.

HOUSE_PARKING_LOT_ADD:
Drive a vehicle to the intended parking lot, which must be within %d units from the entrance.
Type `{FFA500}/house save{A9C4E4}` to save the location, or `{FFA500}/house cancel{A9C4E4}` to cancel.
HOUSE_PARKING_LOT_ADD_MSG: {10F441}Type `{DDFFDD}/house save{10F441}` to save the location, or `{DDFFDD}/house cancel{10F441}` to cancel.
HOUSE_PARKING_LOT_ADDED: The parking lot has been added to this location.
HOUSE_PARKING_LOT_INVALID_ID:
The Id '%s' does not represent a valid parking lot.
Usage: `{FFA500}/house remove [0-%d]{A9C4E4}`
HOUSE_PARKING_LOT_NONE: You cannot remove parking lots if there are none!
HOUSE_PARKING_LOT_NOT_IN_VEHICLE: You must be in a vehicle in order to create the parking lot. Try again?
HOUSE_PARKING_LOT_REMOVE:
Find the parking lot Ids in the beams that have been created around you.
Type `{FFA500}/house remove [id]{A9C4E4}` to remove a parking lot, or `{FFA500}/house cancel{A9C4E4}` to cancel.

HOUSE_PARKING_LOT_TOO_FAR: The parking lot must be within %d units from the property (you are %d units away). Try again?

HOUSE_SETTINGS_PICKUP_REMOVE: Are you sure that you want to remove the {FFA500}%s{A9C4E4} from your house?
HOUSE_SETTINGS_PICKUP_REMOVED: The {FFA500}%s{A9C4E4} has been removed from your house.
HOUSE_SETTINGS_SELL_CONFIRM: You are about to sell %s's house. The player will *not* get a refund. Are you certain?
HOUSE_SETTINGS_SELL_CONFIRMED: The house has successfully been sold. {FFA500}%${A9C4E4} has been deposited in your bank account.
HOUSE_SETTINGS_SELL_CONFIRMED_ADMIN: The house has successfully been sold. {FFA500}%${A9C4E4} has been washed down the drain. Thanks.
HOUSE_SETTINGS_SELL_OFFER:
You are about to sell your house. The bank offers you a refund of {FFA500}%${A9C4E4}.
This action cannot be reverted -- you sure?
HOUSE_SETTINGS_SPAWN_DISABLED: You won't respawn at this house anymore.
HOUSE_SETTINGS_SPAWN_ENABLED: You will now start spawning at this house.
HOUSE_SETTINGS_VEHICLE_SELL: Do you want to dispose of the %s you've got parked there?
HOUSE_SETTINGS_VEHICLE_SOLD: The vehicle has been removed from the parking lot by the city council.
HOUSE_SETTINGS_WELCOME_MESSAGE: Your house's welcome message has been updated!
HOUSE_WELCOME: {10F441}Welcome home, %s! Type `{DDFFDD}/house settings{10F441}` to manage your house.
IGNORE_ADDED_PLAYER: @success You won't be seeing communication from %s anymore.
IGNORE_IGNORED_NOBODY: @error Nobody is being ignored right now.
IGNORE_REMOVED_PLAYER: @success You'll start to receive messages from %s again.
KILLTIME_ADMIN_STOPPED: {DC143C}Killtime{FFFFFF}: An administrator has stopped the killtime. Luckily, the prize will still be handed.
KILLTIME_AUTO_STOPPED: {DC143C}Killtime{FFFFFF}: Time is up! The prize will be given out shortly.
KILLTIME_MAXIMUM_TEN_MINUTES: {DC143C}Killtime{FFFFFF}: Sorry, there is a maximum of ten minutes.
KILLTIME_MINIMUM_TWO_MINUTES: {DC143C}Killtime{FFFFFF}: Sorry, there is a minimum of two minutes.
KILLTIME_STARTED: {DC143C}Killtime{FFFFFF}: The following %d minutes is killing for a prize! Are you the one with the most kills?
KILLTIME_TOPKILLER: {DC143C}Killtime{FFFFFF}: Leading: %s. Hurry up and get more to win the prize of $%d or more!
KILLTIME_USAGE: {DC143C}Killtime{FFFFFF}: '/killtime start 4 35' for 4 minutes killtime, none = 2 minutes. '/killtime stop' to end.
KILLTIME_INVALID_WEAPON: {DC143C}Killtime{FFFFFF}: Sorry, this is not a valid weapon.
LIMITS_NOT_IN_MAIN_WORLD: you're not in the main world
LIMITS_THROTTLED: you can only do this once per %s
LOCATION_NO_TELEPORT: @error Sorry, the owner has locked the door because %s!
LVP_ACCESS_EXCEPTION_ADDED_ADMIN: %s (Id:%d) has allowed %s (Id:%d) to use the "%s" command.
LVP_ACCESS_EXCEPTION_ADDED_FYI: {80CBC4}*** %s (Id:%d) has allowed you to use the "%s" command.
LVP_ACCESS_PLAYERS_GRANTED: %s has made the command "%s" available to all players.
LVP_ACCESS_PLAYERS_REVOKED: %s has revoked the "%s" command from players.
LVP_ACCESS_EXCEPTION_REMOVED_FYI: {80CBC4}*** %s (Id:%d) has revoked your ability to use the "%s" command.
LVP_ANNOUNCE_CMD_AVAILABLE: %s has made the /%s command available to players.
LVP_ANNOUNCE_CMD_LEVEL: %s (Id:%d) has changed the level of /%s to %s.
LVP_ANNOUNCE_CMD_REVOKED: %s has removed the /%s command from players again.
LVP_ANNOUNCE_PLAYER_ISOLATED_1: %s (Id:%d) has been isolated by %s (Id:%s), and is now excluded from the game.
LVP_ANNOUNCE_PLAYER_ISOLATED_2: Administrators will continue to see their messages, other players won't.
LVP_ANNOUNCE_PROFILE_FINISHED: The profile initiated by %s has been concluded.
LVP_ANNOUNCE_PROFILE_START: %s (Id:%d) has started profiling the JavaScript code for %dms.
LVP_ANNOUNCE_SUBSTITUTION_ADDED: %s (Id:%d) has created a substitution from "%s" to "%s".
LVP_CMD_EXCEPTION_GRANTED: {ADFF2F}*** %s (Id:%d) has given you an exception to use /%s.
LVP_CMD_EXCEPTION_RESTORED: {ADFF2F}*** Your %d command exceptions has been restored.
LVP_CMD_EXCEPTION_REVOKED: {ADFF2F}*** %s (Id:%d) has removed your exception to use /%s.
LVP_JETPACK_NOT_AVAILABLE_VW: @error Sorry, you can't use the /jetpack command in this world!
LVP_JETPACK_GRANTED_SELF: @success You have been given a jetpack, enjoy!

LVP_PLAYGROUND_HEADER: Las Venturas Playground is the SA-MP server you're playing on.
LVP_RELOAD_NOT_ELIGIBLE: @error The {FF8282}%s{FFFFFF} feature is not eligible for live reloading.
LVP_SKIP_DAMAGE_UPDATED: @success %s will %s be subject to skip damage effects.
LVP_SETTING_INVALID_NUMBER: Whuh? {FFA500}%s{A9C4E4} is not a number, you silly billy!
LVP_SETTING_INVALID_STRING: Whuh? Your value needs to be between [1, 255] characters!
LVP_SETTING_UPDATED: The {FFA500}%s{A9C4E4} setting has been updated to {FFA500}%s{A9C4E4}.
MUTE_MUTED_NOBODY: @error Nobody on the server is muted right now.

MUTE_SHOW_REPORT_MESSAGE_1: You have been muted by %s (Id:%d) for %s.

NUWANI_ADMIN_MESSAGE_FORMAT: %s (Id:%d) has reloaded the IRC message format.

PLAYER_COMMANDS_COLOR_INVALID_FORMAT: @error Colors must be given as #RRGGBB color codes.

PLAYER_COMMANDS_SPAWN_WEAPONS_TELEPORT_T: @error Sorry, the player can't get weapons now because %s %s.

POSITIONING_FORWARD: @success I like to move it, move it (forward)!

RACE_ERROR_NO_RACES_AVAILABLE: @error Sorry, there are no races available right now.

RACE_ERROR_NOT_OUTSIDE: @error Sorry, you can't start a race while you're outside!
RADIO_ANNOUNCE_INVALID_DEFAULT_RADIO: The configured default radio channel {FF8282}%s{FFFFFF} is invalid.

REACTION_TEST_ANNOUNCE_WINNER_SECOND: {FFFF00}%s has won the reaction test in %.2f seconds. They've won once before.
REACTION_TEST_ANNOUNCE_WINNER: {FFFF00}%s has won the reaction test in %.2f seconds. They've won %d times before.
REACTION_TEST_TOO_LATE: {DC143C}Too late! %s beat you to the right answer, and were %.2f seconds faster.

VEHICLE_ANNOUNCE_SAVED: %s (Id:%d) has stored a %s in the database.
VEHICLE_DELETE_HELP: @error You can only delete vehicles part of your house, unless you're an administrator.
VEHICLE_ENTER_ALREADY_DRIVING: @error You're already driving an %s - leave the vehicle first!
VEHICLE_ENTER_NONE_NEAR: @error There is no vehicle close enough near you to enter.

VEHICLE_ENTER_SEAT_OCCUPIED: @error That seat in the %s is already occupied!
VEHICLE_ENTERED: @success You have been teleported in to the %s!
VEHICLE_HEALTH_UPDATED: @success The vehicle's health has been updated from {FF8282}%d{FFFFFF} to {FF8282}%d{FFFFFF}.
VEHICLE_LOCK_PASSENGER: @error You can only lock a vehicle when you're the driver!
VEHICLE_LOCK_REDUNDANT: @success The %s had already been locked for you!
VEHICLE_LOCK_UNREGISTERED: @error Sorry, only registered players can lock vehicles. Register now on www.sa-mp.nl!
VEHICLE_NOT_DRIVING: @error %s is not currently in a vehicle managed by JavaScript.
VEHICLE_NOT_DRIVING_SELF: @error You need to be in a vehicle in order to use this command.
VEHICLE_QUICK_ALREADY_DRIVING: @error Sorry, but you're already driving a vehicle!
VEHICLE_QUICK_COLLECTABLES: @error Keep tagging Spray Tags and shooting Red Barrels to enable this command!
VEHICLE_RESET: @success The vehicle layout has been reset.
VEHICLE_RESPAWN_NOT_IN_VEHICLE: @error %s is not in a vehicle, which can thus not be respawned.
VEHICLE_SAVE_HELP: @error You need to have a house with parking lot in order to save this vehicle.
VEHICLE_SAVE_TOO_BUSY: @error Sorry, this area is too busy! There already are %d vehicles (max: %d) and %d models (max: %d).
VEHICLE_SAVED: @success The %s has been %s in the database.
VEHICLE_SEIZE_DRIVER_SELF: @error You already are the driver of your vehicle!
VEHICLE_SEIZE_ON_FIRE: @error The vehicle is on fire, you crazy! Get out instead!
VEHICLE_SEIZE_ON_FOOT: @error You need to be in a vehicle in order to use this command.
VEHICLE_SEIZED: @success You've seized the vehicle, on you go.
VEHICLE_SPAWN_NOT_ALLOWED: @error You are not allowed to spawn vehicles right now.
VEHICLE_SPAWN_NOT_ALLOWED_TRAIN: @error You are unable to create trains using this feature.
VEHICLE_SPAWN_NOT_FOUND: @error We're not sure what vehicle {FF8282}%s{FFFFFF} is...
VEHICLE_SPAWN_REJECTED: @error Sorry, you can't spawn vehicles right now because %s.
VEHICLE_UNLOCK_PASSENGER: @error You can only unlock a vehicle when you're the driver!
VEHICLE_UNLOCK_REDUNDANT: @error No need to unlock your vehicle because it's not locked!
VEHICLE_UNLOCK_UNREGISTERED: @error Sorry, only registered players can unlock vehicles. Register now on www.sa-mp.nl!

ZONE_DECORATION_REMOVE_CONFIRM: Are you sure that you want to remove this {FFA500}%s{A9C4E4}?
